Posts.EditableText:
I was wondering how often games get added to the archive. I looked at the most recent games, and I didn't see any more recent than July 2006.

Can anyone comment on the frequency of when games get added?

thanks.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
it depends how fast people are making them.
I know I haven't made any for ages because I didn't have Windows for a long time.

Posts.EditableText: I've not had many games uploaded since July. I have received yours though and will add it today.
Posts.HTML: I've not had many games uploaded since July. I have received yours though and will add it today.

Posts.EditableText: Lol. I'm making a huge game at the moment but it won't be available to download, only connect to as it's online.
Posts.HTML: Lol. I'm making a huge game at the moment but it won't be available to download, only connect to as it's online.

Posts.EditableText: Mine is coming along slowly, but it's still coming along. Don't expect anything huge with a lengthy plot, though. It's fairly plotless and simply a puzzle-filled tribute to classic IF.
Posts.HTML: Mine is coming along slowly, but it's still coming along. Don't expect anything huge with a lengthy plot, though. It's fairly plotless and simply a puzzle-filled tribute to classic IF.

Posts.EditableText: Yay. I'm glad you're back though Slayer.
Posts.HTML: Yay. I'm glad you're back though Slayer.

Posts.EditableText:
Mine is almost done.  I am just going back through and adding all the little details I can think of.   I am trying to make sure that anything ever mentioned in my game is able to be manipulated in a variety of ways.  Fortunatly Quest 4.0 is speeeding up this process.  The main plotline, puzzles, and correct path(s) through the game work great and bug free.  I guess it really is all in the details.

Dr. Froth.
